typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,enum GunPoolContext.PlaneType) view external returns (struct GunPoolContext.PlaneContext memory)

attributes.type: function (address,enum GunPoolContext.PlaneType) view external returns (struct GunPoolContext.PlaneContext memory)

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance of spender on the tokens owned by owner

params.spender: The user allowed to spend the owner's tokens

returns._0: The amount of owner's tokens spender is allowed to spend*

approve(address,uint256).details: Allows `spender` to spend the tokens owned by _msgSender()

params.spender: The user allowed to spend _msgSender() tokens

burn(address,uint256).details: burns gpTokens from `user` and sends the equivalent amount of underlying to `user`

params.user: The owner of the lpTokens, getting them burned

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()
params.subtractedValue: The amount being subtracted to the allowance

getNormalTotalSupply().details: getNormalTotalSupply the Normal total supply of gptoken return: the Normal total supply of gptoken*

getUserNormalBalanceAndSupply(address).details: getUserNormalBalanceAndSupply Normal gpTokens balance from `user` and total supply of gptoken

params.user: The owner of the gpToken return: the Normal gptoken balance of user and the Normal total supply of gptoken*

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.addedValue: The amount being added to the allowance
params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()

params.amount: The amount of tokens getting minted return `true` who mint gpToken first*
params.user: The address receiving the minted tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of tokens from _msgSender() to recipient

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of token from sender to recipient, if _msgSender() is allowed to do so

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
